review: Wow. This little dongle works better than anything Microsoft or Apple have ever done. I have an Android phone, and already used Chrome, so full disclosure: I don't know if it plays nice with Windows or Apple products. That said, the setup was easy. Crazy easy. Wi-Fi connection was simple, and the Netflix and Youtube apps work exactly like you would expect, which covers about 80% of the use. If you do have an android phone, you can cast seamlessly from the Google Play Music app, which for me covers the rest of the use. One note: Use the chromecast buttons inside the Youtube/Netflix players. You can cast a Chrome tab, but it's in Beta and pretty disappointingly slow to play video. That said, you should be fine casting just about anything else. So, yes. Best $31 you can spend on any electronic device right now.
